title: The Mural
description: Peyton Kelly was at the top. One of the smartest of her class, captain of the soccer team, senior class president, and overachiever. Students and teachers alike respected her, and it seemed like senior year was going to be smooth sailing.That is until a new girl from a big city, Jamie Kendall, shows up and forces Peyton to recognize her fear of the truth and threatens to dismantle everything she knows about herself.
author: Lauryn Brooks
